h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><p><strong>这是我参与8月更文挑战的第5天，活动详情查看：<a href="https://juejin.cn/post/6987962113788493831" title="https://juejin.cn/post/6987962113788493831" target="_blank">8月更文挑战</a></strong></p>
<h1 data-id="heading-0">使用场景</h1>
<p>在常见社交App中，发送消息或者接收到他人消息后，消息列表都会自动滑动到底部，不需要我们手动滑动，这样的用户体验好。</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-1">思路</h1>
<p>ListView使用ScrollController来控制滑动，其中有<code>jumpTo</code>、<code>animateTo</code>2个方法滑动到指定的位置。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-dart copyable" lang="dart"><span class="hljs-comment">/// <span class="markdown">packages/flutter/lib/src/widgets/scroll<span class="hljs-emphasis">_controller.dart</span></span></span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> jumpTo(<span class="hljs-built_in">double</span> value)&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">assert</span>(_positions.isNotEmpty, <span class="hljs-string">'ScrollController not attached to any scroll views.'</span>);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">final</span> ScrollPosition position <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">List</span><ScrollPosition>.from(_positions))
      position.jumpTo(value);
&#125;

Future<<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span>> animateTo(
    <span class="hljs-built_in">double</span> offset, &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">required</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Duration</span> duration,
      <span class="hljs-keyword">required</span> Curve curve,
    &#125;) <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">assert</span>(_positions.isNotEmpty, <span class="hljs-string">'ScrollController not attached to any scroll views.'</span>);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> Future.wait<<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span>>(<Future<<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span>>>[
      <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">int</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i < _positions.length; i += <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) _positions[i].animateTo(offset, duration: duration, curve: curve),
    ]);
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>看命名就能看出来，<code>jumpTo</code>不带动画效果，<code>animateTo</code>能设置滑动动画。</p>
<p>第一个参数<code>value</code>和<code>offset</code>都是代表ListView中的指定位置。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">ScrollPostion</h2>
<p>那么应该传入哪个值才是代表ListView的底部呢？</p>
<p>通过<code>ScrollController</code>2个方法的源码发现最终调用的是<code>_position</code>的<code>jumpTo</code>、<code>animateTo</code>方法。</p>
<p>_postion是一个<code>ScrollPostion</code>，<code>ScrollPostion</code>中有2个变量<code>minScrollExtent</code>、<code>maxScrollExtent</code>，分别代表滑动到顶部、底部的位置。</p>
<p>最终可以使用以下代码实现滑动到底部</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-dart copyable" lang="dart">scrollController.jumpTo(scrollController.position.maxScrollExtent);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h1 data-id="heading-3">实现</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">布局</h2>
<p>首先我们来定义一个简单的聊天界面。一个ListView，一个输入框，一个发送消息的按钮。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/cc7cc402c1904a8682c015c2940fe766~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="image.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-dart copyable" lang="dart"><span class="hljs-comment">/// <span class="markdown">消息列表</span></span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">List</span><<span class="hljs-built_in">String</span>> _messages = [<span class="hljs-string">"在干嘛"</span>,<span class="hljs-string">"吃饭了吗"</span>,<span class="hljs-string">"想你了"</span>,<span class="hljs-string">"早点睡"</span>];
TextEditingController _textEditingController = TextEditingController();
ScrollController _scrollController = ScrollController();

<span class="hljs-meta">@override</span>
Widget build(BuildContext context) &#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> Scaffold(
    appBar: AppBar(
      title: Text(<span class="hljs-string">'女神'</span>),
    ),
    body: Column(
      children: [
        Expanded(
          child: ListView.builder(
            controller: _scrollController,
            itemBuilder: (context, index) &#123;
              <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> SizedBox(
                child: Center(child: Text(_messages[index])),
                height: <span class="hljs-number">50</span>,
              );
            &#125;,
            itemCount: _messages.length,
          ),
        ),
        Row(
          children: [
            Expanded(
              child: Padding(
                padding: <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: <span class="hljs-number">10</span>),
                child: TextField(
                  controller: _textEditingController,
                  decoration: InputDecoration(
                    hintText: <span class="hljs-string">"请输入消息"</span>,
                  ),
                  textInputAction: TextInputAction.send,
                  onSubmitted: sendMessage,
                ),
              ),
            ),
            IconButton(
              onPressed: () &#123;
                <span class="hljs-comment">/// <span class="markdown">发送消息</span></span>
                sendMessage(_textEditingController.text.trim());
                <span class="hljs-comment">/// <span class="markdown">清除输入框中的内容</span></span>
                _textEditingController.text = <span class="hljs-string">""</span>;
              &#125;,
              icon: Icon(Icons.send),
            ),
          ],
        ),
        SizedBox(height: <span class="hljs-number">5</span>),
      ],
    ),
  );
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">滑动到底部</h2>
<p>点击发送按钮时，获取输入框中的消息，添加到消息列表中，更新ui，然后滑动到底部。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-dart copyable" lang="dart"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> sendMessage(<span class="hljs-built_in">String</span> message) &#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (message.isEmpty) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>;
  setState(() &#123;
    _messages.add(message);
  &#125;);
  _scrollController.jumpTo(_scrollController.position.maxScrollExtent)；
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">问题</h3>
<p>看起来没啥问题，但是运行发现，每次发送完消息后，列表并没有滑动到底部，而是滑动到了倒数第二次数据。</p>
<p>原因是执行滑动到底部的操作时，列表数据还没有更新，<code>maxScrollExtent</code>还是更新之前的值。</p>
<p><img src="https://p1-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/308f11e872644472b83f78760105e2f3~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="20210826_112101.gif" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-7">解决方案</h3>
<p>那么我们需要等待setState刷新列表之后，再执行滑动操作。
所以我们可以使用延迟执行方案。一般延迟时间设置300到500毫秒即可。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-dart copyable" lang="dart"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> sendMessage(<span class="hljs-built_in">String</span> message) &#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (message.isEmpty) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>;
  setState(() &#123;
    _messages.add(message);
  &#125;);
  <span class="hljs-comment">/// <span class="markdown">延迟500毫秒，再进行滑动</span></span>
  Future.delayed(<span class="hljs-built_in">Duration</span>(milliseconds: <span class="hljs-number">500</span>), () &#123;
    _scrollController.jumpTo(_scrollController.position.maxScrollExtent);
  &#125;);
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>ok！大功告成，下面是演示效果。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/41a45f2261304848b69d8b5f79e179b1~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="20210826_120757.gif" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p></div>  
</div>
